H0.text: Absorbed is a sound wave that has been absorbed.

H1.text: Refracted is a sound wave that has been described as an echo.

H2.text: Scattered is what an echo is, a sound wave that has been scattered.

H3.text: Reflected is what an echo isâ€”a sound wave that has been reflected.

A4.text: An echo is a reflection of sound that arrives at the listener with a delay after the direct sound.
